imdb.plot outline: Tong Xue childhood parents died, live uncle home. In order to raise graduate tuition, her spare time to go to the restaurant to work, Tong Xue's tenacity and beauty to see her Mo Shaoqian heart rippled. How do you think when Mo's business in crisis, Mo father sudden death, is due to Tong Xue father sold. Mo Shaoqian in order to save the family business, was forced to marry with Muqian Mu Yongfei. Mu Yong Fei Mo Shaoqin love, but possessive she only use the means of despicable tied him around. Therefore, Mo Shaoqian and Mu Yongfei wedding night separation of life, and repeatedly asked for a divorce. Mu Yong Fei had to threaten to maintain the company's business, refused to sign the divorce agreement, the relationship between husband and wife exist in name only.
